1582920.name: CATch the Stars Soundtrack
1582920.description:
It includes all the original songs from the "CATch the Stars" game series, specially composed by the incredibly talented Tatyana Jacques, in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Now you can enjoy the songs from the "CATch the Stars" game series on your computer, directly from your Steam client. They are calm and chilled songs, perfect for a moment of relaxation.

The songs can be accessed directly through the Steam platform, following the steps below:



Or in the '' CATch the Stars '' Soundtrack folder in the Steam directory:
...\Steam\steamapps\music\CATch the Stars Soundtrack
